content.en: Atarize is a smart chatbot service that allows businesses to create a personal bot that speaks on behalf of their business. The bot answers FAQs, collects leads, and provides 24/7 customer service. It's based on advanced GPT technology and fits any business type - from restaurants to software companies.

Our chatbot offers significant benefits:
â€¢ 24/7 customer service without interruption
â€¢ Immediate response to FAQs
â€¢ Quality lead collection
â€¢ Time and resource savings
â€¢ Improved conversions and sales
â€¢ Accurate data on customer behavior
â€¢ Personalized adaptation to business tone and style

To set up your chatbot, you choose what services, questions, and information it should knowâ€”done via a simple form we send you. Then you upload a text file, info page, or any relevant content you want the bot to understand. Bot setup typically takes 2-5 business days, depending on how quickly we receive the information and content from the client. After that, you'll receive a personal chatbot link that speaks on behalf of your business. It can be embedded on your site, shared via WhatsApp, or distributed however you prefer.

GPT stands for Generative Pre-trained Transformer â€” a cutting-edge language model that understands and generates human-like text. Here's what each part means:
â€¢ Generative â€“ it creates content, not just analyzes it.
â€¢ Pre-trained â€“ trained on massive text datasets to grasp context, facts, and styles.
â€¢ Transformer â€“ a powerful AI architecture that revolutionized natural language processing.

Our bot is built on this technology and learns your content deeply. It detects context, understands messages, and responds in a way that fits your business. You can feed it with large amounts of information, and it will retrieve answers smartly and naturally. This helps you save time, support clients better, and turn any website or landing page into an automated service and sales toolâ€”without needing extra staff.

title.en: Chatbot Use Cases by Business Type

content.en:
Our chatbot seamlessly fits a wide variety of business types, offering automated, smart customer service 24/7. It handles FAQs, collects leads, routes queries to the right person, and builds reliable data for ongoing optimization.

Examples by industry:
â€¢ Restaurants/Bars â€“ menus, allergens, event info, quick Q&A via WhatsApp/Instagram, and lead collection for private bookings.
â€¢ Real Estate â€“ gather preferences (location, budget, rooms), send relevant listings with galleries, book tours, handle document coordination.
â€¢ Clinics â€“ appointment scheduling, insurance and pricing info, pre-visit questionnaires, and automatic reminders.
â€¢ Agencies and service providers â€“ receive briefs, estimate pricing/time, classify inquiries by service (design, dev, campaigns), forward to staff.
â€¢ Recruiting/HR â€“ filter candidates by availability, send short tasks or resume requests, schedule interviews.
â€¢ Education/Courses â€“ details on programs, registration, payments, availability, and event reminders.
â€¢ SaaS/Software â€“ real-time tech support and knowledge base access.

This reduces phone/email load, speeds up response times, increases lead quality, eliminates redundant staff work, and improves conversions. You can track key metrics like response time, resolution rate, or scheduled bookings â€“ and easily update the bot's knowledge to stay accurate.

â“ Can I update the content later?
âœ… Yes. Small updates are included. Significant changes may require coordination and an additional fee.

â“ How do I pay?
âœ… One-time setup fee + monthly subscription. You can pay via Bit, credit card or bank transfer.

â“ Does it work both on websites and WhatsApp?
âœ… Yes â€“ the chatbot can be embedded in a website, landing page, or shared as a WhatsApp link. For official WhatsApp integration, a verified Meta Business account and dedicated phone number are required.

â“ Can it integrate with external systems?
âœ… No, there is no direct integration with external CRM systems. However, leads can be delivered via Webhook or CSV export.

â“ How do I get started?
âœ… Leave your details in the chat or form below â€“ full name, phone number, and email â€“ and we'll get back to you ASAP.

â“ Can users send files in the chat?
âœ… Yes, depending on your preferences and plan. We support various file types including text, images, and audio files.
